page.title: 12Lifestyle - Child's View
page.content: dinners and some go home. Dinner time lasts for an hour 12.00 to 1.00 pm. Afternoon school finishes at 3.30 pm. I go home straight away, and from 4.00 pm until 5.00 pm approximately watch childrens' TV. Usually I play out with my friends after tea, perhaps going to the park or playing football or cricket. I come home in the early evening, watch TV or read or do a crossword or some other game, wash and go to bed. I often complain there is not a lot to do but I suppose there is really. At weekends I play out with my friends and sometimes I go into Stockport to buy clothes and records if my mother will let me.
